author: Good Enough
description:
K2 isn’t just the world’s second‑highest peak, it’s the deadliest. Towering at 28,251 feet, this Himalayan giant has claimed the lives of one in four climbers who attempt its summit. Brutal storms, sheer ice walls, and unpredictable avalanches make every step a fight for survival. 

#K2 #SavageMountain #DeadliestMountain #Mountaineering
title: The Deadliest Mountains 💀😰 #didyouknow  #mountains #outdoors #animation
